text: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Kids is an American-Canadian computer-animated series produced by Cartoon Pizza, Nelvana, Portfolio Entertainment, 9 Story Entertainment, Studio 306, The Canadian Film or Production Tax Credit, Shaw Rocket Fund, Canadian Television Fund, and Nickelodeon Animation Studio. Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2000s American animated television series Category:Canadian animated television series Category:Nickelodeon television series
title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Kids
